author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO INTENSIFYING AS IT MAKES ITS CLOSEST APPROACH TO MEXICO...
summary: ...IVO INTENSIFYING AS IT MAKES ITS CLOSEST APPROACH TO MEXICO... As of 3:00 PM CST Thu Aug 07 the center of Ivo was located near 18.8, -105.8 with movement NW at 21 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IVO INTENSIFYING AS IT MAKES ITS CLOSEST APPROACH TO MEXICO... As of 3:00 PM CST Thu Aug 07 the center of Ivo was located near 18.8, -105.8 with movement NW at 21 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
